QuestData.Title: Beyond the Horizon
QuestData.Description: I recognize all you've managed to do here, $c. My report to the Warchief will include an account of your deeds.$b$bBut there's no time to rest!$b$bThis land must be charted and prepared for Horde settlement. I've already selected an away team to do just that.$b$bFind them before they grow comfortable here. Inform them of their mission, and try to convince your new friends to send along one of their own to serve as a guide.$b$bYou'll be staying here with me. We have preparations to make.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Shokia, Sergeant Gorrok, Shademaster Kiryn, and Chief Kah Kah.
